page.title: 16Life_Styles A Child's Day
page.content: My day starts at half past six when I wake up.I have half an hour reading and get dressed.I choose a good book and go downstairs to the kitchen.I get my favouite cereal and pour myself my favourite drink.I eat and read at the same time.When I have finished I go and make my bed.I then have half an hour to myself. At about twenty to nine I leave for school on my bicycle.We go in school and lessons start at nine.At twenty to eleven we have break and I play French Skipping.The next break is from twelve to one fifteen.The last break is from two fifteen to two twenty five.At quarter past three we go home. When I get home I read until four twenty and then watch television till six.I play on the computer till seven and then watch television till eight.I then go to bed. By Sally Lampard.
